corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: COD: a viscous liquid derived from petroleum, used especially as a fuel or lubricant.

sentence.text: The following year , Iran made a down payment for Project Flower by providing Israel with $280 million worth of oil .
